Text: FW HSR info needed Cc Legal is requesting some information for the HartScottRodino Act filing related to the merger by the end of the day tomorrow Please see below I have listed the description of the codes below The information is requested for the year Please provide a list of states in which Enron subsidiaries entities incorporated in the US only which earned revenues in have customers conduct their operations or have physical office locations as specified below for the following NAICS codes only The revenues should include intercompany revenues I am attaching a file which was compiled a few months ago containing the largest Enron companies earning revenues in and their respective NAICS codes This is not allinclusive but is a good start Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Sal Electric Power Distribution Natural Gas Distribution Coal and Other Mineral and Ore Wholesalers Petroleum Bulk Stations and Terminals Telecommunications Resellers Commodity Contracts Dealing Original Message From Essig Carol Sent Monday November PM To Dominguez Sal Subject HSR info needed Sal Thanks in advance for your kind assistance Per our phone conversation can you please provide me with the states in which Enron Corps subsidiaries of which it owns or more conduct operations for the following NAICS codes states in which operations are conducted states in which operations are conducted states in which the customers are located states in which the customers are located states in which operations are conducted states in which the physical offices are located Sal Also please provide the and revenue data for Portland General by NAICS code I will contact Valerie and or Kirk at Portland General to get the list of subs info for PGE I know that his is short notice but I have just been given the information and has made this request immediately to you Unfortunately they have requested to have it by the end of the day tomorrow They will let me know if they can give additional time If you should have any questions please let me know Carol X
